subject: Haptic questions
description_text: Is there a way to buy the vam for the throttle and the vam pro for the brake? All is see is packs with all of them the same. And what control box would I need if I was mixing and matching? I’ll be putting them on thrustmaster pedals until I can upgrade to your guys pedals.

conversations.body_text: Hi Ian Birmingham,  We currently do not offer separate sales, as all products are pre-packaged. Additionally, you will need our PlusX controller and a standalone power supply to use it.
